short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test different input values in WizeDec strategy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is meant to be used with the WizeDec strategy on TradingView.com site to optimize inputs for it, by automatically going through values and saving the results in a downloaded Excel file for later analysis.

To automatically go through the values, follow these simple steps: 
•	make sure you have added WizeDec strategy to your TradingView chart and have the input window open
•	click on the WizeDec Optimiser icon seen at the top right of your browser
•	set the speeds of preloading and saving values – the faster your computer, the lower the values can be. If they are set too low, the Optimiser will not work correctly
•	click start and wait until the the process is done – it will take about 6 to 9 minutes to be completed. If only ‘Long’ or ‘Short’ is selected, then the process will be completed in about 30 seconds

The Optimiser can run in the background in another window.

The file with the results will be downloaded automatically.

For further instructions, visit www.WizeDec.com
